author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: Scoped slots are a useful feature of Vue that can make components more versatile and reusable. The only problem is they're hard to understand! In this article, I'll go through a step-by-step example so you can see how useful scoped slots are.
name: Getting Your Head Around Vue.js Scoped Slots
